comments.body: If we're exposing this API, perhaps we could add a bit more to the comment, like "Exception thrown when a task is explicitly killed (i.e., task failure is expected)."
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,10 @@
 
 package org.apache.spark
 
+import org.apache.spark.annotation.DeveloperApi
+
 /**
  * Exception for a task getting killed.
